title: Where to buy COVID vaccination card holders and lanyards
body: Airlines and concert venues may require proof of vaccination in order to get in, which means keeping your vaccination card safe and available is important. (Dan Gleiter | dgleiter@pennlive.com)COVID-19 vaccination cards are en route to becoming one of the most important forms of documentation you own. and may require proof of vaccination in order to get in, which means keeping your vaccination card safe and available is important. You can even get  when you show a valid COVID-19 vaccination card at any of the company’s U.S. shops. and  are currently offering promotions to get vaccination cards laminated for free. But  that the cards should stay writeable for booster shots down the road.To help avoid misplacing or losing your proof of COVID-19 vaccination, below is a list of card holders and lanyards you can buy from retailers like , , , ,  and .(Photos courtesy of Amazon and Coach)(Photo courtesy of Amazon and Vera Bradley)Note to readers: if you purchase something through one of our affiliate links we may earn a commission.
